description: A second year student from class 2-C & Leo`s classmate. She is a part time curry waitress at a restaurant named Oasis. She is one of Leo`s childhood friends and is his next-door neighbour. She is extremely vulgar and childish and always says what is on her mind. Nagomi is her ultimate rival and they are constantly fighting; Kinu has nicknamed her Coconuts. Both Kinu and Nagomi enjoy picking on other and starting fights with Leo, whom they supposedly hate.
name: Kanisawa Kinu
